## \_addOrUpdate() function

Add or update a object in given array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _addOrUpdate<T extends {}>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, updatedObj: Partial<Immutable<T>>, idProp: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The array to add or update object |
|  updatedObj | Partial&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The new or updated object |
|  idProp | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A unique identifier for the object |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
